name: Tiny Bird - Watch Edition
description:
INNOVATIVE and UNIQUE!

Tiny Bird brings an exciting little game to your Apple Watch, which makes you experience how it is to play a game on your wrist! Using an innovative way to display smooth animations on the watch, this game is truly unique.

Your goal is to navigate the bird through the openings between the pillars. Tap the button to give your bird an upward boost.

FEATURES:
- Smooth and fluent game playing, experience true game playing on your watch!
- Simple and user friendly interface
- innovate, creative and unique way to use your Apple Watch: your friends will be amazed
- Submit scores to GameCenter
